mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM YJ_PANORAMA WHERE MEM_NO = #{value}

SELECT PANO_NO, MEM_NO, PANO_TITLE, PANO_LIKE, PANO_REGDATE, PANO_DAY_NO, PANO_DAY_DATE, PANO_DAY_LOCA, PANO_DAY_MEMO FROM ( SELECT CEIL((ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.PANO_NO DESC))/8) RN, A.PANO_NO, A.MEM_NO, A.PANO_TITLE, A.PANO_LIKE, TO_CHAR(A.PANO_REGDATE, 'yyyy.mm.dd') PANO_REGDATE, B.PANO_DAY_NO, B.PANO_DAY_DATE, B.PANO_DAY_LOCA, B.PANO_DAY_MEMO FROM YJ_PANORAMA A, YJ_PANO_DAY B WHERE A.PANO_NO = B.PANO_NO AND B.PANO_DAY_DATE = 1 ) WHERE RN = #{value}
